column1: @AustinMahone you were so vocal about CORONAVIRUS, WELL WHAT ABOUT NOW?

We’re not post-pandemic. The pa…

I'm more worried about getting my dad sick if I get infected with the coronavirus then I am about myself. Theres only been two cases here but I'm worried as hell about my dad cause he's almost 60 and has copd I hate the idiots that are able bodied and healthy hoarding nessicities
